name: Witch Way Out
description:
It's Halloween night, and you are a friendly ghost looking for one last house to stop at before you go home. Fortunately for you, there just so happens to be one house you've missed! It's down in the creepy dark woods and appears to be made entirely out of candy, so you know it's bound to be a good score.

What could possibly go wrong?

Point and Click to move/interact, Mouse Wheel or Overhead Bar to select your interaction.

I am working on a Mac version, but it won't likely be out any time soon.

My submission for Beginner's Circle Jam #2.
